document_data.name: Hikinokini
document_data.mainbody: '''Hikinokini''' was a [[sunwatcher]] in [[Mitzlato]] in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.History: In [[1362 DR]], Hikinokini was at the welcoming party for [[Sozarro]]'s expedition as an observer.
